sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid } from "@material-ui/core"; import styles from "./Cards.module.css"; const Cards = ({ data: { confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate } }) => { function formatValue(number) { return number.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, "."); } if (!confirmed) { return "Loading..."; } return (
Infected {formatValue(confirmed.value)} REAL DATE Number of active cases of COVID-19 Recovered {recovered.value} REAL DATE Number of recoveries from COVID-19 Deaths {deaths.value} REAL DATE Number of deaths caused by COVID-19
); }; export default Cards;
